title: Pumpkin and ginger cheesecake
ingredients: ['135g gingernut biscuits, crushed into crumbs', '100g hazelnuts, ground in a food processor', '3 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '6 tablespoons melted unsalted butter', '685g cream cheese, softened', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '375g pumpkin puree', '125ml double cream', '75ml maple syrup', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '4 eggs']
